column1: Celebration of Life Services will be held at 10:00 a.m.
column4: 2015 at the Ford-Wulf-Bruns Chapel with the Reverend Mike Elrod of the Westside Christian Church officiating. Burial will follow in the Restlawn Cemetery under the direction of the Ford-Wulf-Bruns Chapel.  Visitation hours will be held from 9:00 a.m.
column8: 2015 at the Ford-Wulf-Bruns Chapel in Coffeyville
